New Records: Mohammed Shami took 5 wickets for 54 runs in the match.
Daryl Mitchell scored 130 runs for New Zealand.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored 95 runs and was dismissed by Henry.
Rohit Sharma was dismissed for 46 runs by Lockie Ferguson.
Mohammed Shami was the Player of the Match.
Pre-Game Insights: India elected to field first after winning the toss.
New Zealand's total of 273 was their highest score in the series.
Post-Match Reflections: India won the match by 4 wickets with 12 balls remaining.
This was India's second consecutive win in the World Cup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played under floodlights due to a day-night format.
The result helped India secure a crucial win in the tournament.
